Title: An Act Constituting Sitios of Paalaman, Tatlong Pulo, Calumpit, Supot, Bukal and La Mesang Bato, All in Barangay Special District, Municipality of Jalajala, Province of Rizal into a New Barangay to be Known as Barangay Paalaman
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 786
An Act Constituting Sitios of Paalaman, Tatlong Pulo, Calumpit, Supot, Bukal and La Mesang Bato, All in Barangay Special District, Municipality of Jalajala, Province of Rizal into a New Barangay to be Known as Barangay Paalaman
Section 1. The sitios of Paalaman, Tatlong Pulo, Calumpit, Supot, Bukal and La Mesang Bato, all in Barangay Special District, Municipality of Jalajala, Province of Rizal, are hereby separated from Barangay Special District and constituted into a new barangay of the said municipality to be known as Barangay Paalaman.
Section 2. Barangay Paalaman shall include the area bounded by: N Eastern part of Barangay Sipsipin, E Barangay Bagumbong, W Barangay Special District, S Barangay Lubo.1Ã¢wphi1
Section 3. After ratification by the majority of the votes cast in a plebiscite to be conducted in the area affected within one hundred twenty days from the approval of this Act, the President of the Philippines shall appoint the first officials of Barangay Paalaman who shall hold office until their successors shall have been elected and qualified in the next regular barangay election.
Section 4. The Commission on Elections shall conduct and supervise the plebiscite herein provided. The expenses for such plebiscite shall be charged to the appropriations of the Commission on Elections provided in the current annual General Appropriations Act for plebiscites.
Section 5. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: April 27, 1984
